== Main inclusion report for cppunit ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/c/cppunit/, compiled on all supported arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' library required by aptitude (>= 0.4.0) to build.

3. ''Security:''
* No security relevant binaries.
* No CVEs.
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: One open Debian bug with patch.
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* Debian package and library policy met.
